units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S7U02 — Sun–Earth–Moon phenomena

units.title: Chemical Sciences — AC9S7U04 — Pure substances vs mixtures

units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S6U01 — Habitats & survival conditions
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Biological Sciences, so this Y6 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Waste Management Technician
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more on Chemical Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.
